Package it.polimi.ingsw.utilities

Class MessageCreator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utilities.MessageCreator
public class MessageCreator extends Object
This class generates JsonObjects for the various communication cases.
Author:
Riccardo Motta

      Creates the reply for "gameCreation" message.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the newly created game.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • getOnlinePlayers

      private static com.google.gson.JsonArray getOnlinePlayers(GameController gameController)
      Creates a list of players for "enterGame" message.
      Parameters:
      gameController - The GameController from which getting all the required data.
      Returns:
      JsonArray which represents the list of players and connected users.

    • login

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject login(boolean logged)
      Creates the reply for "login" message.
      Parameters:
      logged - A boolean second which indicates if the user has correctly logged to a game or not.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • turnEnable

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject turnEnable(String player, boolean enable)
      Creates the message used to give the communication token to a specified user.
      Parameters:
      player - The name of the player who is going to receive the communication token.
      enable - true if it's this player's turn, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • status

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject status(GameController game)
      Creates the message used to send the current game status to a user who just joined the game.
      Parameters:
      game - The gameController instance involved.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject gameCreation(int playersNumber, boolean expert)
      Creates the "gameCreation" request message.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - The players number of the game.
      expert - A boolean parameter which indicates the difficulty of the desired game.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • playAssistant

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject playAssistant(String player, int assistantId)
      Creates the "playAssistant" command.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's performing the move.
      assistantId - The id of the assistant card played.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • moveStudent

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject moveStudent(String player, HouseColor color, String from, String to, Integer fromId, Integer toId, boolean specialCharacter)
      Creates the "moveStudent" command.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's performing the move.
      color - The color of the student moved.
      from - The initial position.
      to - The final position.
      fromId - The initial island's id (null if the move doesn't involve islands or characters).
      toId - The final island's id (null if the move doesn't involve islands or characters).
      specialCharacter - true if it comes from a special character.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • moveMotherNature

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject moveMotherNature(int islandId, boolean move)
      Creates the "moveMotherNature" command.
      Parameters:
      islandId - The destination island.
      move - true if mother nature has to be moved, false only if resolving an island as the effect of a special character.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

    • payCharacter

      public static com.google.gson.JsonObject payCharacter(String player, int characterId)
      Creates the "payCharacter" command.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's performing the move.
      characterId - The paid special character's id.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.

      Creates the "refillEntrance" command.
      Parameters:
      player - The player who's performing the move.
      cloudId - The cloud's id.
      Returns:
      JsonObject which represents the message.
